definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִקָָץ]] 1Ki 18:27; [[וַיִּיקַץ]] Ge 28:16 + 3 t.; [[וַיִּקַץ]] Ju Jdg 16:20, Ps 78:65, 1Ki 3:15 (v. Baer); [[וׇאִיקָָץ]] Ge 41:21; [[יִֽקְחוּ]] Hb Hab 2:7; —awake, Ge 41:4, Ge 41:7, Ge 41:21 (E), 1Ki 3:15; of Baal 1Ki 18:27; sq. [[מִשְּׁנׇתוֹ]] Ge 28:16 (J), Ju Jdg 16:14, Jdg 16:20; of Noah, [[מִיֵּינוֹ]] Ge 9:24 (J), i.e. from drunken sleep; fig. of ´[[י]] Ps 78:65, i.e. become suddenly active; of enemies Hb Hab 2:7.—Vid. also [[קיץ]]
